lines.text:
[Seeing Denny in a fashionable dress]
It's not the get-up, Shorty. It;s just that you can't make a racehorse out of a jackass.

[to Indians]
Next time send your chief Yellow Hand after me.
Mr. Cody, Mr. Cody, I can never thank you enough.
Sure you can if you want to.

[Speaking to Cody after he has insulted Yellow Hand]
If he ever catches you, I hope you're not around.
Listen, Shorty, you follow the redhead and I'll marry you.
Easy for you to say. You don't like women.
That's right. Maybe that's why I'm so fond of you.
